title: Hugging Face Launches Reachy Mini, Open-Source Robot for AI Enthusiasts and Educators
description:
Hugging Face, in collaboration with Pollen Robotics, launched Reachy Mini, a desktop-sized open-source robot designed for AI experimentation and education. It is now available for pre-order globally.

Developed for human-robot interaction and creative coding, the robot is available in two versions: ...
